content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your straightforward approach. Let's start with the price. What is your initial offer for the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm looking to rent the apartment for €1,000.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your initial offer is quite high for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. I was expecting something more in the range of €800 to €900. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is already significantly lowered from my initial offer and I will not go any lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. If you're not willing to negotiate further, I respect that. I'll consider your offer of €1,000 and think it over. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
